About SinzTools

SinzTools is a collection of free, privacy-first online tools for images, PDFs, and everyday utilities. All our tools run locally in your browser - your files never leave your device.

We're constantly improving and adding new tools based on user feedback. Your input helps make SinzTools better for everyone!
